00125         public Member(int iMemberId)
00126         {
00127             mySqlConn conn = new mySqlConn();
00128             conn.connect();
00129             // We launch the query
00130             List<Hashtable> lhResultset = conn.lhSqlQuery("Select u.id_user, login, password, profile, active, id_member, firstName, lastName, birthdate, address_1, city, county, postalcode, type, payment_method, is_active, address_2, emerg_contact_name, emerg_contact_relation, emerg_contact_phone, emerg_contact_mobile, medical_allergies, medical_notes, picture, medical_doctor_name, medical_phone, email, member_number from members m, users u where u.id_user = m.id_user AND m.id_member = '" + iMemberId + "'");
00131 
00132             // Check if we found the member
00133             if ((int)lhResultset.Count > 0)
00134             {
00135                 this.BIs_active = (lhResultset[0]["is_active"].ToString() == "True") ? true : false;
00136                 this.IId_member = int.Parse(lhResultset[0]["id_member"].ToString());
00137                 this.SAaddress_2 = lhResultset[0]["address_2"].ToString();
00138                 this.SAddress_1 = lhResultset[0]["address_1"].ToString();
00139                 this.SBirthdate = lhResultset[0]["birthdate"].ToString();
00140                 this.SCity = lhResultset[0]["city"].ToString();
00141                 this.SCounty = lhResultset[0]["county"].ToString();
00142                 this.SEmail = lhResultset[0]["email"].ToString();
00143                 this.SEmerg_contact_mobile = lhResultset[0]["emerg_contact_mobile"].ToString();
00144                 this.SEmerg_contact_name = lhResultset[0]["emerg_contact_name"].ToString();
00145                 this.SEmerg_contact_phone = lhResultset[0]["emerg_contact_phone"].ToString();
00146                 this.SEmerg_contact_relation = lhResultset[0]["emerg_contact_relation"].ToString();
00147                 this.SFirstName = lhResultset[0]["firstName"].ToString();
00148                 this.SLastName = lhResultset[0]["lastName"].ToString();
00149                 this.SMedical_allergies = lhResultset[0]["medical_allergies"].ToString();
00150                 this.SMedical_doctor_name = lhResultset[0]["medical_doctor_name"].ToString();
00151                 this.SMedical_notes = lhResultset[0]["medical_notes"].ToString();
00152                 this.SMedical_phone = lhResultset[0]["medical_phone"].ToString();
00153                 this.SMemberNumber = lhResultset[0]["member_number"].ToString();
00154                 this.SPayment_method = lhResultset[0]["payment_method"].ToString();
00155                 this.SPicture = lhResultset[0]["picture"].ToString();
00156                 this.SPostalcode = lhResultset[0]["postalcode"].ToString();
00157                 this.SType = lhResultset[0]["type"].ToString();
00158                 this.usrUser = new User();
00159                 this.usrUser.IId_user = int.Parse(lhResultset[0]["id_user"].ToString());
00160                 this.usrUser.SLogin = lhResultset[0]["login"].ToString();
00161                 this.usrUser.SPassword = lhResultset[0]["password"].ToString();
00162                 this.usrUser.SProfile = lhResultset[0]["profile"].ToString();
00163             }
00164         }

00167          * This method will save the object into the database
00168          */
00169         public bool bSave()
00170         {
00171             // Field checking
00172             string sMysqlDate = Utils.sGetMysqlDate(this.SBirthdate);
00173             string sQuery;
00174 
00175             if (sMysqlDate == "0000-00-00")
00176             {
00177                 MessageBox.Show("The birth date is in incorrect format");
00178             }
00179             else if (Utils.bValidateEmail(this.SEmail) == false)
00180             {
00181                 MessageBox.Show("The E-Mail address is incorrect");
00182             }
00183             else
00184             {
00185                 this.usrUser = new User();
00186                 // First the user object is filled
00187                 usrUser.BActive = (this.BIs_active) ? true : false;
00188                 usrUser.SLogin = this.SEmail;
00189                 usrUser.SPassword = sMysqlDate;
00190                 usrUser.SProfile = "member";
00191 
00192                 // then the bSave method is called
00193                 if (usrUser.bSave())
00194                 {
00195                     mySqlConn conn = new mySqlConn();
00196                     conn.connect();
00197                     sQuery = "insert into `gym`.`members` (`id_member`, `firstName`, `lastName`, `birthdate`, `address_1`, `city`, `county`, `postalcode`, `type`, `payment_method`, `id_user`, `is_active`, `address_2`, `emerg_contact_name`, `emerg_contact_relation`, `emerg_contact_phone`, `emerg_contact_mobile`, `medical_allergies`, `medical_notes`, `picture`, `medical_doctor_name`, `medical_phone`, `email`, `member_number`) values " +
00198                              "(NULL, '" + this.SFirstName + "', '" + this.SLastName + "', '" + sMysqlDate + "', '" + this.SAddress_1 + "', '" + this.SCity + "', '" + this.SCounty + "', '" + this.SPostalcode + "', '" + this.SType + "', '" + this.SPayment_method + "', '" + usrUser.IId_user + "', '" + ((this.BIs_active) ? "1" : "0") + "', '" + this.SAaddress_2 + "', '" + this.SEmerg_contact_name + "', '" + this.SEmerg_contact_relation + "', '" + this.SEmerg_contact_phone + "', '" + this.SEmerg_contact_mobile + "', '" + this.SMedical_allergies + "', '" + this.SMedical_notes + "', NULL, '" + this.SMedical_doctor_name + "', '" + this.SMedical_phone + "', '" + this.SEmail + "', '" + this.SMemberNumber + "')";
00199 
00200                     int iMbrId = conn.iInsert(sQuery);
00201                     if (iMbrId > 1)
00202                     {
00203                         MessageBox.Show("The new member has been added to the databse succesfully!");
00204                         return true;
00205                     }
00206                     else
00207                     {
00208                         MessageBox.Show("There was a problem adding the new user, please check your data!");
00209                         usrUser.bDelete();
00210                         return false;
00211                     }
00212                 }
00213                 else
00214                 {
00215                     MessageBox.Show("The e-mail already exists in the database!, please choose another one.");
00216                     return false;
00217                 }
00218 
00219             }
00220              return true;
00221         }
